meanings.sent1: The deuteranopic glasses helped him see colors better.
meanings.sent2: Her deuteranopic vision made it hard to distinguish between certain shades.
meanings.sent3: The deuteranopic artist accidentally painted the sky green instead of blue.
meanings.sent4: His deuteranopic view of the world added a unique perspective to his artwork.
meanings.sent5: The deuteranopic filter on the camera enhanced the red tones in the photograph.

meanings.sent1: The deuteranopic struggled to differentiate between red and green.
meanings.sent2: She met a deuteranopic at the colorblind support group.
meanings.sent3: The deuteranopic won the costume contest by wearing mismatched colors.
meanings.sent4: He felt like a deuteranopic in a world full of vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The deuteranopic's unique perspective on colors fascinated his friends.
